__e: Your nutso brother almost got me killed.
- Look, mate... I couldn't give a bugger about the Yank's reasons for wanting to carry on... because I happen to know they're half-baked anyway.
Are you nuts, telling Dorfler I offered you $100.000... when I told him I'd give him $25.000? Wait a minute.
No. It was some creep asshole trying to scare me.
Maybe it's some freak who likes to do things in the dark to give himself a lift.
You the same fool that came dressed as a coolie?
God! What are you, fucking insane, man?
Who do you think you're dealing with? A fucking idiot here?
Who do you think you're dealing with? A fucking idiot here?
And so I can't work fast enough to catch up... and I can't run fast enough to catch up... and the only thing that catches me up... is doin' my magic act.
